name: H.A.P.P.-y Inc.
description:
Discover the joys of being an employee of a space corporation flying through... SPACE!

TUTORIAL
because we're chaotic and forgot to include it in-game, which may add to your, dear user, experience, so if you'd like, skip reading the text below

Your screen is split into two parts: 

LEFT - monitoring surroundings and steering the corpospaceship.

For this, use WSAD  (or arrows, whichever's more comfortable to you) for maneuvring and E for docking the spaceship to the stations.

RIGHT - managing the workflow of the corporation on your desk, which you can do with your mouse. 

Other general instructions and tips:

There are five paper types, one's for the boss, who gets red in the face

Two are for stations, rotating in space

And two are junk

"Nobody reads the junk, so why bother spending time on it" - colleague

"Coffee can SAVE your head, dude!" -  another colleague

"Don't mind the number of papers sent to the boss or crashing into asteroids, maaan..." - a missing colleague

H.A.P.P.-y  =>  Hyper Abusive People's Place

Post Scriptum

If you have a Norton antivirus, it'll delete all the Unity libraries and the game will crash. Not sure how to solve this problem, maybe an exempt? 

Game uses Unity DOTS so it might be unstable.
